data.comment: The match is underway at Willem II Stadion.
Vangelis Pavlidis is on target to give Willem II a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 7, Mike Tresor Ndayishimiye with an assist there.
Willem II take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Gorkem Saglam.
Mike Tresor Ndayishimiye instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 34, Giorgos Giakoumakis puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-1.
That's a fine assist from Tobias Pachonik.
Erwin Blank blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Pol Llonch (Willem II) has received a yellow card from Erwin Blank.
John Yeboah is replacing Che Nunnely for the home team.
In the minute 73, Torino Hunte for Venlo has been booked by Erwin Blank and receives a first yellow card.
Adrie Koster (Willem II) is making a second substitution, with Paul Gladon replacing Vangelis Pavlidis.
Venlo make their first substitution with Joshua John replacing Evert Linthorst.
In the minute 80, The away team have replaced Torino Hunte with Guus Hupperts. This is the second substitution made today by Hans De Koning.
Leeroy Owusu (Willem II) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Vincent Schippers.
Hans De Koning is making the team's third substitution at Willem II Stadion with Stan Van Dijck replacing Giorgos Giakoumakis.
In the minute 84, Chris Kum is replacing Steffen Schafer for Venlo at Willem II Stadion.
Willem II's Mike Tresor Ndayishimiye has been booked in Tilburg.
The away team have replaced Roy Gelmi with Zinedine Machach. This is the fifth substitution made today by Hans De Koning.
Erwin Blank blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
